extended_tooltips.text: Suppressor Grenade: Throws a grenade which explodes for <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_DamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> damage and leaves behid a goop that lasts <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.count*duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_PersistentGoop.periodic.durations[0]"/> seconds and slows attack and movement speed of enemies on it by <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerGrenade_BuffSlow.modifiers[0].amount*(-1)"/>%.

Assault Roll: Rolls away from a threat, dodging all attacks and gaining a major attack speed increase for next <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerRoll_ASBuffStacksApplier.stacks"/> attacks. These attack will also briefly stun light enemies.

The effect expires in <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerRoll_ASBuffStacks.duration"/> seconds if not used up.

Assault Drone: Releases an Assault Drone which has <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_Unit.vital_health.maximum"/> life and a weapon that attacks for <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_UnitWeaponDamage.amount" style="Red"/> damage every <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_UnitWeapon.period"/> seconds. Times out in <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerDrone_TimedLife.duration"/> seconds.

Mark: Marks an enemy, causing them to take <d ref="(duckiesCloneRykerMark_DebuffDRNormal.modify_fraction-1)*100"/>% more damage for <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerMark_DebuffNormal.duration"/> seconds.
Effect is diminished against Resilient and Hero enemies.

Full Salvo: Bombards an area with <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerBombs_StartPersistent.periodic.count"/> explosive rounds. Each round deals <d ref="duckiesCloneRykerBombs_ImpactDamageRadius.amount" style="Red"/> area damage.
